title: Rare iMac Prototype Won't Boot (Can We Fix It?) - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: Rare iMac Prototype Won't Boot (Can We Fix It?) - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
description: This rare iMac G3 prototype won't bootheck, it won't even power on! Can Krazy Ken and Steve fix it? Watch the prototype "first impressions" episode   Watch Steve's channel@Mac84   Check out our rare tech playlist   Download our epic wallpapers    Support our channel and get cool stuff   Follow us on Twitter   Like us on Facebook   Subscribe and listen to our podcast     Patrons got to see this episode early! They also got behind-the-scenes access, Discord VIP access, and their names in the credits! Pledge now to get those awesome perks, and help fund the future of the Computer Clan! Thanks for your support.   This is Steve's blog post. If you watched the episode and saw "that scene" near the end, then click this link!   Contact Us    Get royalty-free stock footage with Artgrid. Sign up with my link to support the channel and get 2 extra months free:   I also use Artlist for the music in my videos. I highly recommend them  Click for 2 extra months free:   Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?    Computer Clan is an Amazon Associate. Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program.  #KrazyKen #ComputerClan #AppleProductHistoryCC
